scripts.preinstall: if [ ! -d android-dist/pos-android ]; then cd android-dist; git clone git@github.com:gigasource/pos-android.git; fi
scripts.prebuild:apk: if [ ! -d ../../../dist ]; then cd ../../../;npm run build; fi
scripts.build:apk: npm run build:android:dest && cd android-dist && ./gradlew build
scripts.setup-react-native: git clone git@github.com:gigasource/pos-restaurant-react-native.git && cd pos-restaurant-react-native && npm install && mkdir nodejs-assets/nodejs-project-android && mkdir nodejs-assets/nodejs-project-ios && rm -rf nodejs-assets/nodejs-project
scripts.build:android:react: node android/pkg.js && cp build/app-android pos-restaurant-react-native/nodejs-assets/nodejs-project-android/app-android && cp build/app-android.js pos-restaurant-react-native/nodejs-assets/nodejs-project-android/app-android.js
scripts.build:ios:react: npm run build:ios && cp build/app-ios pos-restaurant-react-native/nodejs-assets/nodejs-project-ios/app-ios && cp build/app-ios.js pos-restaurant-react-native/nodejs-assets/nodejs-project-ios/app-ios.js
